# GitHub Repository Topics
# Add these topics to your repository for better discoverability:
#
# archlinux, package-manager, gui, pyqt6, aur, flatpak, npm, pacman,
# linux, python, qt, desktop-application, system-administration,
# foss, open-source, package-management, linux-tools, arch-linux
#
# To add topics:
# 1. Go to https://github.com/Sanjaya-Danushka/Aurora
# 2. Click "Settings" tab
# 3. Scroll down to "Topics" section
# 4. Add the relevant topics from the list above
